name: Lonely Planet Peru 9th Edition
description: Trek the ancient Inca trail, puzzle over the mystery of the Nasca lines, wander the stone temples of Machu Picchu or indulge in local delicacies in Lima, all with this trusted travel guide to Peru. Included are photos, maps and comprehensive planning tools to help you get the most out of your trip.

Author: Carolyn McCarthy, Greg Benchwick, Alex Egerton, Phillip Tang, Luke Waterson
